name: bloomers
description: A pair of comfortable, louse white trousers worn beneath the dress but over other undergarments.  As important as your hat.

A very elegant Chinese style dress, showing the characteristic sideways seam going from the collar to the end of the right side, plus an intrincate embroided design across the surface.  Tight and slightly uncomfortable for the upper body, the tiny sleeves are no issue, and the sideways seam enables natural leg movement by use of a clever breaking point for the entire fabric.  This will make you feel like a celebrity on a blockbuster hit or a special secret operative when dispatching zeds.
//: Generic below the knee version, no silk material so it's made of cotton instead

description: A very elegant Chinese style dress, showing the characteristic sideways seam going from the collar to the end of the right side, plus an intrincate embroided design across the surface.  This one's shorter than usual, barely covering below the knees.
//: Ends around 4-6 cm below the knee

description: A very elegant Chinese style dress, showing the characteristic sideways seam going from the collar to the end of the right side, plus an intrincate embroided design across the surface.  This one's bold, as it's short enough it barely covers your thighs, similar to an oversized shirt if it were twenty times more elegant.
//: Covers one third of the thigh at best

description: Classy patent leather shoes.

A golden ear clip, made from a metallic material.  Looks like a big earring, but it's actually more close to an antenna, working as a enhancer for transmitting to the rest of the Network, now disabled due unforseen circumstances.
An otherwise undermarkable, elegant black jacket.
A fine, triangular shaped stainless steel watch.
A pair of unremarkable, stylish black dress pants.
Black dress socks, silk smooth, very elegant.
White baggy pants for practicing Tai Chi.  Very comfy.

name: tang shirt
description: A long sleeved shirt made in characteristic Chinese style.  It has a short, somewhat flexible collar, knots replacing buttons, with the fabric feeling different to the touch compared to the average longshirt.

name: Tang suit
description: A long sleeved jacket made in characteristic Chinese style.  Despite looking like a shirt, it's worn over it, so it qualifies as a jacket.  Has the characteristic collar and the knots replacing buttons, featuring inner pockets.  Special cut allows to hold the overall shape, so it doesn't look loose or baggy.  Putting this on makes you want to try those sick moves.
An undermarkable, long, dapper black necktie.

name: black ribbon
description: A small black ribbon, used to tie your hair.
A black ribbon tied in a bow, used as substitute for a tie.
Long socks, reaching just below the knee.

name: Tengu geta
description: A pair of red Tengu geta.  These are the real deal however, and they look like shoes with a long underside teeth.

name: tokin
description: A small, red polyhedric box-like hat.  It's useful for drinking too.

name: Aya's shirt
description: A white button-up shirt with short, puffy sleeves.  There's black laces at the sleeves and another crossing it in the middle.  The collars and the left side of the button line have a a special mapple-leaf design.
A cotton skirt with frills at the end that goes just above the knees.  There's a special mapple-leaf design at the front right side.

name: frilly dress shirt
description: A white and red shirt with frills and long sleeves.  Looks fancy!
A fedora decorated with a red bow and two long ribbons extending out.
A long, dark blue almost black skirt with frills at the end.
A long-sleeved, jet black dress with green frills.  It's design features Former Hell flora.
A small
//: Smallest related thing I could find, will need to check later when I figure out how materials work
//3: This item maybe needs something else to it

name: black shoes
description: A pair of black shoes.  These have decorative black ribbons.
A small black, sleeves protective vest worn over your clothing.

name: dress shirt (LDC combat uniform)
description: A white button-down shirt with long sleeves.  This is worn by members of the Lunar Defense Corps.

name: lunar blazer (LDC combat uniform)
description: A black, long-sleeved business suit that covers the torso and arms, in reality this is the Lunar Defense Corps combat uniform.  A Lunarian insignia is visible on the pockets.

name: red tie (LDC combat uniform)
description: A red necktie.  This is worn by members of the Lunar Defense Corps.

name: kneesocks (LDC combat uniform)
description: Long, black socks that reach above the knees.  There's a crescent printed on the left side of the left sock.  These are worn by members of the Lunar Defense Corps.

name: lunar skirt (LDC combat uniform)
description: A light colored, pleated skirt.  This is worn by members of the Lunar Defense Corps.

name: deactivated lunar veil
description: A piece of highly advanced Lunarian technology, it allows the user to move between places.  This one is a memento though, and it's deactivated.  It looks like a sort of ethereal scarf, so.

name: lunar helmet
description: A white helmet with space for a Moon Rabbit's ears to stick out of.  It has a black bow decorating the back side.  This is worn by members of the Lunar Defense Corps.

name: lunar shoes (LDC combat uniform)
description: Fancy and comfortable leather shoes.  These are worn by members of the Lunar Defense Corps.

A very elegant Chinese style dress.  More comfy than usual to wear, it's split into two pieces to increase the comfort for the user even more.  Different from the usual style, sleeves are not present, so it's just basically a jacket by itself.  It still displays Chinese motiffs though, such as knots instead of buttons, and the embroidery.

A very elegant Chinese style dress.  More comfy than usual to wear, it's split into two pieces to increase the comfort for the user even more.  This is the lower part, shaped like a long skirt with a peekaboo slit.
A green beret, featuring a golden steel star insignia with the Chinese symbol "dragon" engraved on it.

name: Meiling's shirt
description: A white button-up shirt with short, puffy sleeves.  There's black laces at the sleeves and another crossing it in the middle.  The collars and the left side of the button line have a a special mapple-leaf design.
Leather boots, somewhat resistant to fire made.
A somewhat dark red pair of baggy pants with straps.  The pants themselves date back from the Nara period in Japan.
//: That's the specific name for Mokou's pants. According to the wiki, it's 'sashinuki hakama'.

name: fire-protecting ribbon
description: A large white ribbon made of paper, with red lines and a red outline, used to tie the hair.  It serves both as a hair ornament and as magical protective against fire.
A white-ish shirt, repeatedly mended and burned, now lacking the sleeves.  It looks cooler this way though.  The original color is now lost to the ages.

name: fireproof talismans
description: A bunch of paper talismans that provide excellent protection from fire and smoke.
//: I'm disabling this because I can't a way for the item to cover specific parts + protect those parts from fire + ignore physical attacks so it doesn't get destroyed by melee damage. Instead I'm going the easy way of making a fire immune mat for Mokou's pants (and ribbon) and fire resistant mats for her shirt and booots
Closest thing to a cotton belt, I should add the specs for this specific bow when I figure out how material definitions work
description: A big scarlet bow with a white strip, worn on the waist and tied on the back.  It's decorative.

name: Remilia's dress
description: A pinkish, bell shaped dress, with a scarlet lace. Very elegant.

name: Remilia's mobcap
description: A pinkish mobcap with scarlet lace, featuring an off-centered scarlet ribbon with a white stripe.

name: Remilia's 'shoe protectors'
description: Very elegant red shoe protectors.  Remilia uses them whenever she's going out (these are her actual shoes).

name: Remilia's 'shoes'
description: Very elegant white footwear.  Remilia prefers to wear them over normal shoes (these are actually socks but she pretends they're not).

name: pads
description: A gift from your Mistress.  How could you refuse?
A teal dress with a white and blue vest, floral design, and Chinese patterns.  There is a flower secured by a belt on the waist.

name: hair stick
description: A large hair stick for keeping your hair shaped like a pretzel.

//: Closest thing to a cotton belt, I should add the specs for this specific bow when I figure out how material definitions work
description: A big, light blue tied on the back.  It's decorative.
A bowler hat decorated with heavenly peaches and leaves.
A super elegant blue skirt.
A white shirt that ends as an apron covering the lower body, featuring a mysterious heavenly pattern and a rainbow shard design from an unknown, heavenly material.
//: There's no cotton apron, I should add the specs for this specific apron when I figure out how material definitions work

description: A large cape worn over your back.  It's blank on the outside, but has a mesmerizing star pattern on the inside.

name: green ribbon
description: A big green ribbon used on the head.  The design looks somewhat tattered.
A prism shaped control rod worn on one arm, acting as the legendary 'third leg' from the Yatagarasu.  Allows the user to easily control nuclear abilities.
//: These numbers come from a 60 cm hexagonal prism with 8 cm radius, it's kind of thick though
//2: Maybe change it to moriya_wood or something
//3: Should check how to add a strap so the player doesn't have to drop the rod every time Utsuho crafts something

description: A white, short sleeved puffy shirt with black frills.  This one's modified to make room for the red eye of Yatagarasu
A green skirt.  A white pattern representing nuclear decay is embroided on it.
//2: I remember reading that the pattern corresponds to either Uranium orbitals or the pattern left by subatomic particles on a cloud chamber, but can't remember where

description: A green skirt.  Ghost insignias are present on the edges.

name: hairband and ribbon
description: A black hairband with a black off-center ribbon on it.

A wooden scabbard, designed to hold Roukanken.  It's painted black and it's otherwise plain, except for two paper seals and a Netherworld flower tied at it's ending. It's prepared to be drawn from while it's strapped on the back.  Activate to sheath/draw.
A wooden scabbard, designed to hold Hakurouken.  It's painted black and it's otherwise plain. It's prepared to be drawn from while it's strapped on the back.  Activate to sheath/draw.
A dark green and white vest with some pockets.  Ghost insignias are present underneath the pockets.
